text:
There is a regression when transcoding WMF files to SVG. elements as texts
(mostly), and other graphic primitives, are not correctly positioned in the
resulting SVG image. This does not depend on if the SVG file has or has not an
APM header though.
creator: herve.girod@club-internet.fr
herve.girod@club-internet.fr
